alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:31PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nez Perce and northwestern Lewis Counties through 700 PM PDT... At 631 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Lapwai, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lapwai, Culdesac, Peck, Reubens, Waha, Gifford and Lenore. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 282 and 299. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 20 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
